title: S12 Ep156: Stalked by the Zozo Demon
itunes:title: Stalked by the Zozo Demon
description:
During June and July of 2017, paranormal investigator Tim Wood conducted an experiment where he contacted the Ouija Board demon known as Zozo every night for a month. This was the first time a paranormal research team has conducted an experiment of this nature, live streamed it to tens of thousands of witnesses.
This is the story that brought him into the realm of the demonic and into contact not only with the Zozo entity, but an author with a very different background.

https://www.facebook.com/CelinaSummersAuthor/

https://livescifi.tv/
